it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.tracker

Class Tracker.UpdatingState

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects.Semantics.Base
      • it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects.Semantics.MappingState
        • it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects.Semantics.WritingState
          • it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.tracker.Tracker.UpdatingState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Semantics.Logger
    Enclosing interface:
    Tracker<P,T extends Tracker.Item<?,?,P>>

    public static class Tracker.UpdatingState
extends Semantics.WritingState
    The changing state during a manipulation on the tracking set (see: Tracker).

    This class contains a copy of the tracked Tracker.Item before (getOldItem()) and after (getNewItem()) as well as a tag indicating the manipulation state (Semantics.MappingState.getState()). In particular it describes:

    • Semantics.MappingState.ERROR, if a Java error occurs.
    • Semantics.MappingState.INCONSISTENT , if the state was not considered.
    • Semantics.MappingState.NOT_CHANGED, if nothing has been changed in the tracking set.
    • Semantics.WritingState.ADDED, if something has been added ot the tracked set.
    • Semantics.WritingState.UPDATED, if a semantic object has been replaced in the tracking set.
    • AVERAGED, if two semantic objects have been merged (since equal shape) in the tracking set.
    • REMOVED, if a object has been removed from the tracking set.

    REMARK: extending classes must have static state fields assigned to inter values bigger than REMOVED.

    File: it.emarolab.scene_identification_tracking.semanticSceneLibrary.objects.Semantics

    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpdatingState

        public UpdatingState()
        instantiate this object asInconsistent().

      • UpdatingState

        public UpdatingState(int state)
        Constructs this object with a given state.
        The input parameter must be: Semantics.MappingState.state >= Semantics.MappingState.ERROR & Semantics.MappingState.state <= REMOVED . Otherwise, the Semantics.MappingState.state will be set based on #UpdatingState().
        Parameters:
        state - the outcome of a tracking operation.

    • Method Detail

      • asAveraged

        public Tracker.UpdatingState asAveraged(Tracker.Item oldObj,
                                        Tracker.Item newObj)
        Set this state as AVERAGED and take a snapshot of the tracked Tracker.Item. You should pass Tracker.Item.copy() to this method.
        Parameters:
        oldObj - the tracked item before than merge it with another (with the same shape).
        newObj - the tracked item after the semantic averaging.
        Returns:
        this for chaining calls.

      • asRemoved

        public Tracker.UpdatingState asRemoved(Tracker.Item oldObj)
        Set this state as REMOVED and take a snapshot of the tracked Tracker.Item. You should pass Tracker.Item.copy() to this method. This method forces getNewItem() to null.
        Parameters:
        oldObj - the tracked item that has been remote.
        Returns:
        this for chaining calls.

      • asUpdated

        @Deprecated
public Tracker.UpdatingState asUpdated()
        Deprecated. 
        Do not use directly this method, use #asUpdated(Item, Item) instead. TThis method set Semantics.MappingState.getState() to Semantics.WritingState.UPDATED, does not affect getOldItem() and getNewItem().
        Overrides:
        asUpdated in class Semantics.WritingState
        Returns:
        this for chaining calls.

      • asUpdated

        public Tracker.UpdatingState asUpdated(Tracker.Item oldObj,
                                       Tracker.Item newObj)
        Set this state as Semantics.WritingState.UPDATED and take a snapshot of the tracked Tracker.Item. You should pass Tracker.Item.copy() to this method.
        Parameters:
        oldObj - the tracked item that has been update.
        newObj - the tracked item after the semantic updating.
        Returns:
        this for chaining calls.

      • asAdded

        @Deprecated
public Tracker.UpdatingState asAdded()
        Deprecated. 
        Do not use directly this method, use #asAdded(Item) instead. This method set Semantics.MappingState.getState() to Semantics.WritingState.ADDED, but does not affect getOldItem() and getNewItem().
        Overrides:
        asAdded in class Semantics.WritingState
        Returns:
        this for chaining calls.

      • asAdded

        public Tracker.UpdatingState asAdded(Tracker.Item newObj)
        Set this state as Semantics.WritingState.ADDED and take a snapshot of the tracked Tracker.Item. You should pass Tracker.Item.copy() to this method. This method forces getOldItem() to null.
        Parameters:
        newObj - the tracked item that has been added.
        Returns:
        this for chaining calls.

      • asError

        public Tracker.UpdatingState asError(java.lang.String debug)
        Set this state as Semantics.MappingState.ERROR. This method forces getOldItem() and getNewItem() to null.
        Parameters:
        debug - a debbugging string logged through Semantics.Base#logERROR(Object)
        Returns:
        this for chaining calls.

        @Deprecated
public Tracker.UpdatingState asNotChanged()
        Deprecated. 
        Do not use directly this method, use #asNotChanged(Item) instead. This method set Semantics.MappingState.getState() to Semantics.MappingState.NOT_CHANGED, but does not affect getOldItem() and getNewItem().
        Overrides:
        asNotChanged in class Semantics.WritingState

      • asNotChanged

        public Tracker.UpdatingState asNotChanged(Tracker.Item obj)
        Set this state as Semantics.MappingState.NOT_CHANGED and take a snapshot of the tracked Tracker.Item. You should pass Tracker.Item.copy() to this method.
        Parameters:
        obj - the tracked item that has been not changed, equal for getOldItem() and getNewItem().
        Returns:
        this for chaining calls.

      • asInconsistent

        public Tracker.UpdatingState asInconsistent()
        Set this state as Semantics.MappingState.INCONSISTENT. This method forces getOldItem() and getNewItem() to null.
        Overrides:
        asInconsistent in class Semantics.WritingState
        Returns:
        this for chaining calls.

      • isAveraged

        public boolean isAveraged()
        Returns:
        true if this operation did update the shape of a tracked Tracker.Item. Namely, return Semantics.MappingState.state == AVERAGED;.

      • isRemoved

        public boolean isRemoved()
        Returns:
        true if this operation did remove a tracked Tracker.Item. Namely, return Semantics.MappingState.state == AVERAGED;.

      • getOldItem

        public Tracker.Item getOldItem()
        Returns:
        the snapshot given during state evaluation as 'old' tracked item.

      • getNewItem

        public Tracker.Item getNewItem()
        Returns:
        the snapshot given during state evaluation as 'new' tracked item.
